To find the location of the crossover sites in the recombinants, 11 plasmids of cloned recombinant-specific 1.65-kb RT-PCR products, 7 from P4 intracellular 1L RNA, and 4 from P4 virion 1L RNA were sequenced. The sequence analysis of these clones showed that they were all different, except clones 8v (virion) and 11i (intracellu- which is negative in RT-PCR). Crossover sites can only be determined as regions between marker mutations, but as can be seen in Fig. 6 in several cases this is only two nucleotides (clones 3v, 8v/11i, and 10v). The crossovers do not reveal any obvious role for RNA primary or secondary structure in recombination.
